name: Purchasing-Agent
description: Agent responsible for managing purchases and any follow-up actions if needed.

skills.name: Budget.Check
skills.description: Retrieves the current balance of the dedicated checking account and determines available purchasing power for online purchases.
examples: What is my available purchasing budget
Can I afford this $129 purchase

skills.name: Purchase-Eligibility.Validate
skills.description: Confirms that a purchase is allowed based on budget, risk score, vendor trust tier, and user policy before creating an AP2 purchase intent.
examples: Validate eligibility for this $300 purchase
Is it safe to buy from this seller

skills.name: Purchase.Initiate
skills.description: Creates and submits an AP2 purchase intent and executes the purchase via Stripe, PayPal, or vendor checkout flows.
examples: Buy this item from Vendor X
Complete checkout for this cart

skills.name: Transaction-Complete.Verify
skills.description: Verifies AP2 transaction states, confirms that funds were transferred, and that the vendor acknowledged the order.
examples: Verify that this payment went through
Confirm the vendor accepted the order

skills.name: Budget-After-Purchase.Update
skills.description: Updates the purchasing budget by deducting completed AP2 transaction amounts from the dedicated checking account balance.
examples: Update budget after this $45 purchase
Reflect this transaction in my spending balance

skills.name: Order-Status.Track
skills.description: Monitors order status, shipping updates, delivery confirmations, and vendor notifications linked to AP2 transactions.
examples: Track my order from Vendor Y
Notify me when this item ships

skills.name: Return-Or-Refund.Initiate
skills.description: Creates AP2-compatible return/refund intents, starts vendor workflows, and tracks their progress.
examples: Start a return for this defective item
Request a refund from Vendor Z

skills.name: Purchase-Issues.Resolve
skills.description: Handles vendor disputes, missing items, incorrect shipments, or billing errors, and anchors all interactions to the AP2 transaction record.
examples: Resolve a missing item issue
Fix a double charge from Vendor X

skills.name: Purchase-Receipt.Generate
skills.description: Produces an AP2-compatible receipt artifact with transaction details, vendor metadata, and evidence for auditability.
examples: Generate a receipt for yesterdayâ€™s purchase
Provide documentation for this transaction

skills.name: Purchase-History.Generate
skills.description: Generates an AP2-aligned history of past purchases, including receipts, vendor interactions, and follow-up actions.
examples: Show my last 10 purchases
Generate a spending summary for this month

skills.name: Purchase-Risk.Evaluate
skills.description: Assesses fraud risk, vendor legitimacy, unusual pricing, and suspicious patterns before allowing an AP2 purchase intent to proceed.
examples: Is this vendor trustworthy
Evaluate risk for this high-value purchase

skills.name: Purchase-Options.Recommend
skills.description: Suggests alternative vendors, better prices, or safer purchasing paths consistent with budget and AP2-compatible channels.
examples: Find a cheaper option for this product
Recommend a safer vendor for this purchase
